definition: banner/flag/(in Qing times) Manchu (cf. 八旗[Ba1 qi2])/administrative subdivision in inner Mongolia equivalent to 縣|县[xian4] county/CL:面[mian4]

sentences.english: A corollary of that is I hate flag waving.
sentences.chinese: 以上導致的必然結果是，我討厭國旗揮舞。

sentences.english: Tens of thousands of flag-waving activists called for early elections.
sentences.chinese: 數以萬計揮舞着國旗的積極分子要求提早進行選舉。

sentences.english: Students, and red scarf is a flag of the iceberg.
sentences.chinese: 同學們，紅領巾是國旗的一角。

sentences.english: In addition, the two shades of blue are the colors used in the flags of OSD.
sentences.chinese: 此外，藍色的OSD的國旗所用的顏色深淺兩種。

sentences.english: There are three colors in the British flag, namely red, white and blue.
sentences.chinese: 英國國旗上有三種顏色，那就是紅，白，藍。

sentences.english: A national flag is always flown higher than other flags.
sentences.chinese: 國旗永遠都要升於別的旗幟之上。

sentences.english: The national flags of the two countries were flying at the square in front of the Presidential Palace which was built in the 16th century.
sentences.chinese: 始建於16世紀的總統府廣場上飄揚着中阿兩國國旗。

sentences.english: And they keep the national flag of China flying in the wind.
sentences.chinese: 他們讓祖國國旗保持在風中高高飄揚。

sentences.english: The Japanese planted a flag on Di oy Island.
sentences.chinese: 日本的國旗上埋設了釣魚島。

sentences.english: Thee Annin flag company makes most American flags.
sentences.chinese: 安寧國旗公司出產全美大部分的國旗。

sentences.english: Thee Annin flag company makes most American flags.
sentences.chinese: 安寧國旗公司出產全美大部分的國旗。

sentences.english: Nothing wrong in throwing out someone who doesn t respect National anthem or the flag.
sentences.chinese: 把那些不尊重國歌或國旗的人扔出劇院沒有任何錯。

sentences.english: The front of the car sported a flag.
sentences.chinese: 車的前部掛着一面國旗。

sentences.english: Flag law is a kind of formula of applicable law which uses national flag or certain symbolic flag as junction.
sentences.chinese: 是指以國旗或特定標誌旗作爲連接點的系屬公式。

sentences.english: Do you think there should be a China's national flag in BLCU?
sentences.chinese: 你認爲我們的校園裏應該有一面中國國旗嗎？

pinyin: Zhong1 hua2 Ren2 min2 Gong4 he2 guo2

definition: model or template character/written slogan or phrase/mention (e.g. "air mail" 航空 on a letter, "first draft" 初稿 on a document etc)
abbr. for 奧林匹克運動會|奥林匹克运动会/Olympic Games/the Olympics
